definition[0]: a number that is equal to another number
example[0]: They say the people of Los Angeles speak 12 languages and teach just as many in the schools.
example[1]: A great trip! We visited five countries in as many days  (=in five days).
example[2]: The company now employs four times as many women as men.
example[3]: Grandfather claimed to have as many medals as the general.
